sentences.en: " Pickering agrees that the paper is "very important and original," adding that "it provides strong evidence that the neural coupling underlies the way that speakers come to understand each other.
sentences.cn: 皮克林同意这篇论文“非常重要并且十分新颖”，他还补充说，“这项研究为奠定了交谈双方能够彼此理解的神经耦合提供了强有力的证据。”

sentences.en: “We are now at the beginning of the beginning” of a new relationship, Pickering said.
sentences.cn: 皮克林说，我们现在处于两国新关系的“开端的开端”。

sentences.en: Colonel Pickering: will you tell me what is the exact state of things in Wimpole Street?
sentences.cn: 辟克林上校: 你能不能告诉我温波街的实际情况?

sentences.en: Do my clothes belong to me or to Colonel Pickering?
sentences.cn: 我身上的衣服是属于我还是平克林上校?

sentences.en: Henry Higgins and Colonel Pickering are sitting deep in conversation.
sentences.cn: 亨利·希金斯和皮克林上校下坐着专心地谈话.

sentences.en: Pickering whispers to Eliza and points out the ladies'room.
sentences.cn: 辟克林对伊莉莎小声说话,指给她女客衣帽间.
